Chapter 39

[Charles]528-mrs. wilcox and [Tibby]262-tibby met at [Ducie Street]128-ducie street , where [the latter]3512-the latter was staying . [Their]3513-them interview was short and absurd . [They]3513-them had nothing in common but the English language , and tried by its help to express what [neither of [them]3513-them]3514-neither of them understood . [Charles]528-mrs. wilcox saw in [Helen]257-helen [the family foe]3515-the family foe . [He]360-henry had singled [her]257-helen out as [the most dangerous of [the Schlegels]270-the schlegels]3516-the most dangerous of the schlegels , and , angry as [he]360-henry was , looked forward to telling [[his]360-henry wife]1450-his wife how right [he]360-henry had been . [His]360-henry mind was made up at once : [the girl]969-the girl must be got out of the way before [she]969-the girl disgraced [them]3513-them farther . If occasion offered [she]257-helen might be married to [a villain]3519-a villain or , possibly , to [a fool]3967-a fool . But this was a concession to morality , it formed no part of [his]360-henry main scheme . Honest and hearty was [Charles]528-mrs. wilcox 's dislike , and the past spread itself out very clearly before [him]360-henry ; hatred is [a skilful compositor]3521-a skilful compositor . As if [they]3522-they were heads in a note - book , [he]360-henry ran through all the incidents of [the Schlegels]270-the schlegels ' campaign : the attempt to compromise [[his]360-henry brother]845-his brother , [[his]360-henry mother]4237-his mother 's legacy , [[his]360-henry father]4006-his father 's marriage , the introduction of the furniture , the unpacking of the same . [He]360-henry had not yet heard of the request to sleep at [Howards End]257-helen ; that was to be [their]3522-they master - stroke and the opportunity for [his]360-henry . But [he]360-henry already felt that [Howards End]257-helen was the objective , and , though [he]360-henry disliked [the house]578-the house , was determined to defend [it]578-the house .

[Tibby]262-tibby , on the other hand , had no opinions . [He]262-tibby stood above the conventions : [[his]262-tibby sister]1485-his sister had a right to do what [she]1485-his sister thought right . It is not difficult to stand above the conventions when [we]3528-we leave [no hostages among [them]3530-them]3529-no hostages among them ; [men]616-men can always be more unconventional than [women]615-women , and [a bachelor of independent means]3533-a bachelor of independent means need encounter no difficulties at all . Unlike [Charles]528-mrs. wilcox , [Tibby]262-tibby had money enough ; [[his]262-tibby ancestors]3534-his ancestors had earned it for [him]262-tibby , and if [he]262-tibby shocked [the people]4343-the people in one set of [lodgings]3536-lodgings [he]262-tibby had only to move into another . [His]262-tibby was the leisure without sympathy - an attitude as fatal as the strenuous : a little cold culture may be raised on it , but no art . [[His]262-tibby sisters]1640-his sisters had seen [the family]4226-the family danger , and had never forgotten to discount [the gold islets that raised [them]1640-his sisters from [the sea]904-the sea]3539-the gold islets that raised them from the sea . [Tibby]262-tibby gave all the praise to [himself]262-tibby , and so despised the struggling and the submerged .

Hence the absurdity of the interview ; the gulf between [them]3541-them was economic as well as spiritual . But several facts passed : [Charles]528-mrs. wilcox pressed for [them]3541-them with an impertinence that [the undergraduate]1754-the undergraduate could not withstand . On what date had [Helen]257-helen gone abroad ? To whom ? [Charles]528-mrs. wilcox was anxious to fasten the scandal on [Germany]3-germany . " In what sense ? "[3543-i]

Chapter 40

[Leonard]317-leonard - [he]317-leonard would figure at length in a newspaper report , but that evening [he]317-leonard did not count for much . The foot of the tree was in shadow , since the moon was still hidden behind [the house]578-the house . But above , to right , to left , down [the long meadow]3548-the long meadow the moonlight was streaming . [Leonard]317-leonard seemed not [a man]658-a man , but [a cause]3550-a cause .

Perhaps it was [Helen]257-helen 's way of falling in love - a curious way to [Margaret]278-margaret , whose agony and whose contempt of [Henry]360-henry were yet imprinted with [his]360-henry image . [Helen]257-helen forgot [people]3893-people . [They]3893-people were husks that had enclosed [her]257-helen emotion . [She]257-helen could pity , or sacrifice [herself]257-helen , or have instincts , but had [she]257-helen ever loved in the noblest way , where [man]3975-man and [woman]1451-woman , having lost [themselves]3554-themselves in sex , desire to lose sex itself in comradeship ?

[Margaret]278-margaret wondered , but said no word of blame . This was [Helen]257-helen 's evening . Troubles enough lay ahead of [her]257-helen - the loss of [friends]611-friends and of social advantages , the agony , the supreme agony , of motherhood , which is even yet not a matter of common knowledge . For the present let the moon shine brightly and the breezes of the spring blow gently , dying away from the gale of the day , and let [the earth]1464-the earth , who brings increase , bring peace . Not even to [herself]257-helen dare [she]257-helen blame [Helen]257-helen . [She]257-helen could not assess [her]257-helen trespass by any moral code ; it was everything or nothing . Morality can tell [us]3557-us that murder is worse than stealing , and group most sins in an order all must approve , but it can not group [Helen]257-helen . The surer [its]3558-its pronouncements on this point , the surer may [we]3557-us be that morality is not speaking . [Christ]551-christ was evasive when [they]3559-they questioned [Him]551-christ . It is [those that can not connect who hasten to cast the first stone]3560-those that can not connect who hasten to cast the first stone .

This was [Helen]257-helen 's evening - won at what cost , and not to be marred by the sorrows of [others]893-others . Of [her]257-helen own tragedy [Margaret]278-margaret never uttered a word .

" [One isolates]5849-one isolates , "[257-helen] said [Helen]257-helen slowly . " [I]257-helen isolated [Mr. Wilcox]261-mr. wilcox from the other forces that were pulling [Leonard]317-leonard downhill . Consequently , [I]257-helen was full of pity , and almost of revenge . For weeks [I]257-helen had blamed [Mr. Wilcox]261-mr. wilcox only , and so , when [your]257-helen letters came - "[257-helen]

" [I]278-margaret need never have written them , "[278-margaret] sighed [Margaret]278-margaret . " [They]3559-they never shielded [Henry]360-henry . How hopeless it is to tidy away the past , even for [others]893-others ! "[278-margaret]

" [I]257-helen did not know that it was [your]257-helen own idea to dismiss [the Basts]405-the basts . "[257-helen]

" Looking back , that was wrong of [me]278-margaret . "[278-margaret]

[I]257-helen am less enthusiastic about justice now . But [we]5854-we both thought [you]257-helen wrote at [his]360-henry dictation . It seemed the last touch of [his]360-henry callousness . Being very much wrought up by this time - and [Mrs. Bast]395-mrs. bast was [upstairs]664-upstairs . [I]257-helen had not seen [her]395-mrs. bast , and had talked for a long time to [Leonard]317-leonard - [I]257-helen had snubbed [him]317-leonard for no reason , and that should have warned [me]257-helen [I]257-helen was in danger . [He]360-henry said that [he]360-henry guessed the explanation - [he]360-henry knew of it , and [you]257-helen must n't know . [I]257-helen pressed [him]360-henry to tell [me]257-helen . [He]360-henry said [no one]700-no one must know ; it was something to do with [[his]360-henry wife]1450-his wife . Right up to the end [we]5854-we were [Mr. Bast]319-mr. bast and [Miss Schlegel]479-helen . [I]257-helen was going to tell [him]360-henry that [he]360-henry must be frank with [me]257-helen when [I]257-helen saw [his]360-henry eyes , and guessed that [Mr. Wilcox]261-mr. wilcox had ruined [him]360-henry in two ways , not one . [I]257-helen drew [him]360-henry to [me]257-helen . [I]257-helen made [him]360-henry tell [me]257-helen . [I]257-helen felt very lonely [myself]257-helen . [He]360-henry is not to blame . [He]360-henry would have gone on worshipping [me]257-helen . [I]257-helen want never to see [him]360-henry again , though it sounds appalling . "[257-helen]

[She]3562-she laid [her]3562-she face against the tree .

" [The little]5859-the little , too , that is known about growth ! Both times it was loneliness , and the night , and panic afterwards . Did [Leonard]317-leonard grow out of [Paul]259-paul ? "[3562-she]

[Margaret]278-margaret did not speak for a moment . From where [she]278-margaret sat [she]278-margaret could see them gleam . [She]278-margaret had been trying to count them . " [Leonard]317-leonard is a better growth than madness , "[278-margaret] [she]278-margaret said . " [I]278-margaret was afraid that [you]278-margaret would react against [Paul]259-paul until [you]278-margaret went over the verge . "[278-margaret]

" [I]479-helen did react until [I]479-helen found poor [Leonard]317-leonard . [I]479-helen am steady now . "[479-helen]

" Yes , "[479-helen] repeated [Helen]479-helen , [her]479-helen voice growing more tender , " [I]479-helen do at last understand . "[479-helen]

" Except [Mrs. Wilcox]528-mrs. wilcox , dearest , [no one]700-no one understands [our]5862-our little movements . "[479-helen]

" Because in death - [I]479-helen agree . "[479-helen]

" Not quite . [I]479-helen feel that [you]278-margaret and [I]479-helen and [Henry]360-henry are only fragments of [that woman]5062-that woman 's mind . [She]5062-that woman knows everything . [She]5062-that woman is everything . [She]5062-that woman is [the house]578-the house , and the tree that leans over it . [People]3893-people have [their]3893-people own deaths as well as [their]3893-people own lives , and even if there is nothing beyond death , [we]5862-our shall differ in [our]5862-our nothingness . [I]479-helen can not believe that knowledge such as [hers]5062-that woman will perish with knowledge such as [mine]479-helen . [She]5062-that woman knew about realities . [She]5062-that woman knew when [people]3893-people were in love , though [she]5062-that woman was not in [the room]1189-the room . [I]479-helen do n't doubt that [she]5062-that woman knew when [Henry]360-henry deceived [her]5062-that woman . "[479-helen]

" Good - night , [Mrs. Wilcox]528-mrs. wilcox , "[479-helen] called a voice .

" Oh , good - night , [Miss Avery]469-miss avery . "[479-helen]

" Why should [Miss Avery]469-miss avery work for [us]5868-we ? "[479-helen] [Helen]479-helen murmured .

" Why , indeed ? "[479-helen]

[Miss Avery]469-miss avery crossed [the lawn]598-the lawn and merged into the hedge that divided [it]598-the lawn from [the farm]605-the farm . An old gap , which [Mr. Wilcox]261-mr. wilcox had filled up , had reappeared , and [her]469-miss avery track through the dew followed the path that [he]261-mr. wilcox had turfed over , when [he]261-mr. wilcox improved [the garden]581-the garden and made it possible for games .

" This is not quite [[our]5868-we house]4106-our house yet , "[479-helen] said [Helen]479-helen . " When [Miss Avery]469-miss avery called , [I]479-helen felt [we]5868-we are [only a couple of tourists]5870-only a couple of tourists . "[479-helen]

" [We]5868-we shall be that everywhere , and for ever . "[278-margaret]

" But [affectionate tourists]5871-affectionate tourists - "[479-helen]

" [But tourists who pretend [each hotel]5873-each hotel is [[their]5872-but tourists who pretend each hotel is their home home]1564-their home]5872-but tourists who pretend each hotel is their home . "[278-margaret]

" [I]479-helen ca n't pretend very long , "[479-helen] said [Helen]479-helen . " Sitting under this tree [one]602-one forgets , but [I]479-helen know that tomorrow [I]479-helen shall see the moon rise out of [Germany]3-germany . Not all [your]360-henry goodness can alter the facts of the case . Unless [you]360-henry will come with [me]479-helen . "[479-helen]

[Margaret]278-margaret thought for a moment . In the past year [she]278-margaret had grown so fond of [England]35-england that to leave it was a real grief . Yet what detained [her]278-margaret ? No doubt [Henry]360-henry would pardon [her]278-margaret outburst , and go on blustering and muddling into a ripe old age . But what was the good ? [She]278-margaret had just as soon vanish from [his]360-henry mind .

" Are [you]479-helen serious in asking [me]278-margaret , [Helen]479-helen ? Should [I]278-margaret get on with [[your]479-helen Monica]5876-your monica ? "[278-margaret]

" [You]479-helen would not , but [I]278-margaret am serious in asking [you]479-helen . "[278-margaret]

" Still , no more plans now . And no more reminiscences . "[278-margaret]

[They]3566-they were silent for a little . It was [Helen]479-helen 's evening .

The present flowed by [them]3566-they like a stream . The tree rustled . It had made music before [they]3566-they were born , and would continue after [their]3566-they deaths , but its song was of the moment . The moment had passed . The tree rustled again . [Their]3566-they senses were sharpened , and [they]3566-they seemed to apprehend life . Life passed . The tree nestled again .

" Sleep now , "[278-margaret] said [Margaret]278-margaret .

The peace of [the country]4234-the country was entering into [her]278-margaret . It has no commerce with memory , and little with hope . Least of all is it concerned with the hopes of the next five minutes . It is the peace of the present , which passes understanding . Its murmur came " now , "[3566-they] and " now "[3566-they] once more as [they]3566-they trod the gravel , and " now , "[3566-they] as the moonlight fell upon [[their]3566-they father]879-their father 's sword . [They]3566-they passed [upstairs]664-upstairs , kissed , and amidst the endless iterations fell asleep . [The house]578-the house had enshadowed the tree at first , but as the moon rose higher the two disentangled , and were clear for a few moments at midnight . [Margaret]278-margaret awoke and looked into [the garden]581-the garden . How incomprehensible that [Leonard Bast]317-leonard should have won [her]278-margaret this night of peace ! Was [he]317-leonard also part of [Mrs. Wilcox]528-mrs. wilcox 's mind ?

Chapter 41

Far different was [Leonard]317-leonard 's development . The months after [Oniton]278-margaret , whatever minor troubles [they]3572-they might bring [him]317-leonard , were all overshadowed by [Remorse]552-remorse . When [Helen]479-helen looked back [she]479-helen could philosophize , or [she]479-helen could look into the future and plan for [[her]479-helen child]3573-her child . But [the father]3877-the father saw nothing beyond [his]3877-the father own sin . Weeks afterwards , in the midst of other occupations , [he]3877-the father would suddenly cry out , " [Brute]553-brute - [[you]553-brute brute]5877-you brute , [I]3877-the father could n't have - "[3877-the father] and be rent into [two people who held dialogues . Or brown rain]3575-two people who held dialogues . or brown rain would descend , blotting out faces and the sky . Even [Jacky]325-jacky noticed the change in [him]3877-the father . Most terrible were [his]3877-the father sufferings when [he]3877-the father awoke from sleep . Sometimes [he]3877-the father was happy at first , but grew conscious of a burden hanging to [him]3877-the father and weighing down [his]3877-the father thoughts when they would move . Or little irons scorched [his]3877-the father body . Or a sword stabbed [him]3877-the father . [He]3877-the father would sit at the edge of [his]3877-the father bed , holding [his]3877-the father heart and moaning , " Oh what SHALL [I]3877-the father do , whatever SHALL [I]3877-the father do ? "[3877-the father] Nothing brought ease . [He]3877-the father could put distance between [him]3877-the father and the trespass , but it grew in [his]3877-the father soul .

Remorse is not among the eternal verities . [The Greeks]378-the greeks were right to dethrone [her]3576-her . [Her]3576-her action is too capricious , as though [the Erinyes]554-the erinyes selected for punishment only [certain men]3577-certain men and certain sins . And of all means to regeneration Remorse is surely the most wasteful . It cuts away healthy tissues with the poisoned . It is a knife that probes far deeper than the evil . [Leonard]317-leonard was driven straight through its torments and emerged pure , but enfeebled - [a better man]2964-a better man , who would never lose control of [himself]317-leonard again , but also [a smaller , who had less to control]3579-a smaller , who had less to control . Nor did purity mean peace . The use of the knife can become a habit as hard to shake off as passion itself , and [Leonard]317-leonard continued to start with a cry out of dreams .

[He]317-leonard built up a situation that was far enough from the truth . It never occurred to [him]317-leonard that [Helen]479-helen was to blame . [He]317-leonard forgot the intensity of [their]3580-their talk , the charm that had been lent [him]317-leonard by sincerity , the magic of Oniton under darkness and of [the whispering river]3581-the whispering river . [Helen]479-helen loved the absolute . [Leonard]317-leonard had been ruined absolutely , and had appeared to [her]479-helen as [a man]658-a man apart , isolated from [the world]836-the world . [A real man]4795-a real man , who cared for adventure and beauty , who desired to live decently and pay [his]4795-a real man way , who could have travelled more gloriously through life than the Juggernaut car that was crushing [him]317-leonard . Memories of [Evie]265-evie 's wedding had warped [her]479-helen , [the starched servants]3585-the starched servants , the yards of uneaten food , the rustle of overdressed women , [motor - cars]733-motor - cars oozing grease on the gravel , rubbish on a pretentious band . [She]479-helen had tasted the lees of this on [her]479-helen arrival : in the darkness , after failure , they intoxicated [her]479-helen . [She]479-helen and [the victim]3587-the victim seemed alone in a world of unreality , and [she]479-helen loved [him]317-leonard absolutely , perhaps for half an hour .

In the morning [she]479-helen was gone . The note that [she]479-helen left , tender and hysterical in tone , and intended to be most kind , hurt [[her]479-helen lover]1878-her lover terribly . It was as if some work of art had been broken by [him]317-leonard , some picture in the National Gallery slashed out of its frame . When [he]317-leonard recalled [her]479-helen talents and [her]479-helen social position , [he]317-leonard felt that [the first passerby]3589-the first passerby had a right to shoot [him]317-leonard down . [He]317-leonard was afraid of [the waitress]2931-the waitress and [the porters at [the railway - station]3592-the railway - station]3591-the porters at the railway - station . [He]317-leonard was afraid at first of [[his]317-leonard wife]1450-his wife , though later [he]317-leonard was to regard [her]479-helen with a strange new tenderness , and to think , " There is nothing to choose between [us]3594-us , after all . "[317-leonard]

The expedition to [Shropshire]130-shropshire crippled [the Basts]405-the basts permanently . [Helen]479-helen in [her]479-helen flight forgot to settle the hotel bill , and took [their]3594-us return tickets away with [her]479-helen ; [they]3594-us had to pawn [Jacky]325-jacky 's bangles to get [home]984-home , and the smash came a few days afterwards . It is true that [Helen]479-helen offered [him]317-leonard five thousands pounds , but such a sum meant nothing to [him]317-leonard . [He]317-leonard could not see that [the girl]969-the girl was desperately righting [herself]969-the girl , and trying to save something out of the disaster , if it was only five thousand pounds . But [he]317-leonard had to live somehow . [He]317-leonard turned to [[his]317-leonard family]895-his family , and degraded [himself]317-leonard to [a professional beggar]3598-a professional beggar . There was nothing else for [him]317-leonard to do .

" A letter from [Leonard]317-leonard , "[555-blanche] thought [Blanche]555-blanche , [[his]317-leonard sister]1485-his sister ; " and after all this time . "[555-blanche] [She]555-blanche hid it , so that [[her]555-blanche husband]1223-her husband should not see , and when [he]1223-her husband had gone to [his]1223-her husband work read it with some emotion , and sent [the prodigal]3601-the prodigal a little money out of [her]555-blanche dress allowance .

" A letter from [Leonard]317-leonard ! "[3602-the other sister] said [the other sister]3602-the other sister , [Laura]556-laura , a few days later . [She]556-laura showed it to [[her]556-laura husband]1223-her husband . [He]1223-her husband wrote a cruel insolent reply , but sent more money than [Blanche]555-blanche , so [Leonard]317-leonard soon wrote to [him]1223-her husband again .

And during the winter the system was developed . [Leonard]317-leonard realized that [they]3604-they need never starve , because it would be too painful for [[his]317-leonard relatives]3605-his relatives . Society is based on [the family]4226-the family , and [the clever wastrel]3607-the clever wastrel can exploit this indefinitely . Without a generous thought on either side , pounds and pounds passed . [The donors]3608-the donors disliked [Leonard]317-leonard , and [he]317-leonard grew to hate [them]3608-the donors intensely . When [Laura]556-laura censured [his]317-leonard immoral marriage , [he]317-leonard thought bitterly , " [She]556-laura minds that ! What would [she]556-laura say if [she]556-laura knew the truth ? "[556-laura] When [[Blanche]555-blanche 's husband]3609-blanche 's husband offered [him]317-leonard work , [he]317-leonard found some pretext for avoiding it . [He]317-leonard had wanted work keenly at [Oniton]278-margaret , but too much anxiety had shattered [him]317-leonard ; [he]317-leonard was joining the unemployable . When [[his]317-leonard brother]845-his brother , [the lay - reader]1128-the lay - reader , did not reply to a letter , [he]317-leonard wrote again , saying that [he]317-leonard and [Jacky]325-jacky would come down to [[his]317-leonard village]3612-his village on foot . [He]317-leonard did not intend this as blackmail . Still , [the brother]1166-the brother sent a postal order , and it became part of the system . And so passed [his]317-leonard winter and [his]317-leonard spring .

In the horror there are two bright spots . [He]317-leonard never confused the past . [He]317-leonard remained alive , and blessed are [those who live , if it is only to a sense of sinfulness]3614-those who live , if it is only to a sense of sinfulness . The anodyne of muddledom , by which [most men]2034-most men blur and blend [their]2034-most men mistakes , never passed [Leonard]317-leonard 's lips -

And if [I]0-i drink oblivion of a day , So shorten [I]0-i the stature of [my]0-i soul .

It is a hard saying , and [a hard man]3616-a hard man wrote it , but it lies at the foot of all character .

And the other bright spot was [his]317-leonard tenderness for [Jacky]325-jacky . [He]317-leonard pitied [her]3617-her with nobility now - not the contemptuous pity of [a man who sticks to [a woman]1137-a woman through thick and thin]3618-a man who sticks to a woman through thick and thin . [He]317-leonard tried to be less irritable . [He]317-leonard wondered what [her]3617-her hungry eyes desired - nothing that [she]3617-her could express , or that [he]317-leonard or [any man]4986-any man could give [her]3617-her . Would [she]3617-her ever receive the justice that is mercy - the justice for by - products that [the world]836-the world is too busy to bestow ? [She]3617-her was fond of flowers , generous with money , and not revengeful . If [she]3617-her had borne [him]317-leonard [a child]5685-a child [he]317-leonard might have cared for [her]3617-her . Unmarried , [Leonard]317-leonard would never have begged ; [he]317-leonard would have flickered out and died . But the whole of life is mixed . [He]317-leonard had to provide for [Jacky]325-jacky , and went down [dirty paths]3623-dirty paths that [she]3617-her might have a few feathers and dishes of food that suited [her]3617-her .

One day [he]317-leonard caught sight of [Margaret]278-margaret and [[her]278-margaret brother]665-her brother . [He]317-leonard was in [St. Paul 's]137-st. paul 's . [He]317-leonard had entered [the cathedral]3886-the cathedral partly to avoid the rain and partly to see a picture that had educated [him]317-leonard in former years . But the light was bad , the picture ill placed , and Time and Judgment were inside [him]317-leonard now . Death alone still charmed [him]317-leonard , with [her]278-margaret lap of poppies , on which [all men]4118-all men shall sleep . [He]317-leonard took one glance , and turned aimlessly away towards a chair . Then down [the nave]3627-the nave [he]317-leonard saw [Miss Schlegel]479-helen and [[her]278-margaret brother]665-her brother . [They]3629-they stood in the fairway of [passengers]3630-passengers , and [their]3629-they faces were extremely grave . [He]317-leonard was perfectly certain that [they]3629-they were in trouble about [[their]3629-they sister]5218-their sister .

Once outside - and [he]317-leonard fled immediately - [he]317-leonard wished that [he]317-leonard had spoken to [them]3629-they . What was [his]317-leonard life ? What were a few angry words , or even imprisonment ? [He]317-leonard had done wrong - that was the true terror . Whatever [they]3629-they might know , [he]317-leonard would tell [them]3629-they everything [he]317-leonard knew . [He]317-leonard re - entered [[St. Paul]137-st. paul 's 's]3632-st. paul 's . But [they]3629-they had moved in [his]317-leonard absence , and had gone to lay [their]3629-they difficulties before [Mr. Wilcox]261-mr. wilcox and [Charles]261-mr. wilcox .

The sight of [Margaret]278-margaret turned remorse into new channels . [He]317-leonard desired to confess , and though the desire is proof of a weakened nature , which is about to lose the essence of human intercourse , it did not take an ignoble form . [He]317-leonard did not suppose that confession would bring [him]317-leonard happiness . It was rather that [he]317-leonard yearned to get clear of the tangle . So does the suicide yearn . The impulses are akin , and the crime of suicide lies rather in its disregard for the feelings of those whom [we]3633-we leave behind . Confession need harm [no one]700-no one - it can satisfy that test - and though it was un - English , and ignored by [[our]3633-we Anglican cathedral]3635-our anglican cathedral , [Leonard]317-leonard had a right to decide upon it .

Moreover , [he]317-leonard trusted [Margaret]278-margaret . [He]317-leonard wanted [her]278-margaret hardness now . That cold , intellectual nature of [hers]278-margaret would be just , if unkind . [He]317-leonard would do whatever [she]278-margaret told [him]317-leonard , even if [he]317-leonard had to see [Helen]479-helen . That was the supreme punishment [she]278-margaret would exact . And perhaps [she]278-margaret would tell [him]317-leonard how [Helen]479-helen was . That was the supreme reward .

[He]317-leonard knew nothing about [Margaret]278-margaret , not even whether [she]278-margaret was married to [Mr. Wilcox]261-mr. wilcox , and tracking [her]278-margaret out took several days . That evening [he]317-leonard toiled through the wet to [Wickham Place]11-wickham place , where [the new flats]3636-the new flats were now appearing . Was [he]317-leonard also the cause of [their]3637-their move ? Were [they]3637-their expelled from [society]5803-society on [his]317-leonard account ? Thence to [a public library]3639-a public library , but could find no satisfactory [Schlegel]479-helen in the directory . On the morrow [he]317-leonard searched again . [He]317-leonard hung about outside [[Mr. Wilcox]261-mr. wilcox 's office]3640-mr. wilcox 's office at lunch time , and , as [the clerks]3641-the clerks came out said : " Excuse [me]3641-the clerks , [sir]3955-sir , but is [[your]3955-sir boss]5879-your boss married ? "[3641-the clerks] [Most of [them]3641-the clerks]1346-most of them stared , [some]1595-some said , " What 's that to [you]3955-sir ? "[1595-some] but [one , who had not yet acquired reticence]3644-one , who had not yet acquired reticence , told [him]317-leonard what [he]3644-one , who had not yet acquired reticence wished . [Leonard]317-leonard could not learn [the private address]3645-the private address . That necessitated more trouble with [directories]3646-directories and tubes . [Ducie Street]128-ducie street was not discovered till the Monday , the day that [Margaret]278-margaret and [[her]278-margaret husband]1223-her husband went down on [their]3648-their hunting expedition to [Howards End]257-helen .

[He]317-leonard called at about four o'clock . The weather had changed , and the sun shone gaily on the ornamental steps - black and white marble in triangles . [Leonard]317-leonard lowered [his]317-leonard eyes to them after ringing the bell . [He]317-leonard felt in curious health : doors seemed to be opening and shutting inside [his]317-leonard body , and [he]317-leonard had been obliged to steep sitting up in bed , with [his]317-leonard back propped against the wall . When [the parlourmaid]3649-the parlourmaid came [he]317-leonard could not see [her]278-margaret face ; the brown rain had descended suddenly .

" Does [Mrs. Wilcox]528-mrs. wilcox live [here]4094-here ? "[317-leonard] [he]317-leonard asked .

" [She]528-mrs. wilcox 's out , "[3649-the parlourmaid] was the answer .

" When will [she]528-mrs. wilcox be back ? "[3649-the parlourmaid]

" [I]3649-the parlourmaid 'll ask , "[3649-the parlourmaid] said [the parlourmaid]3649-the parlourmaid .

[Margaret]278-margaret had given instructions that [no one who mentioned [her]278-margaret name]3651-no one who mentioned her name should ever be rebuffed . Putting the door on the chain - for [Leonard]317-leonard 's appearance demanded this - [she]278-margaret went through to [the smoking - room]2654-the smoking - room , which was occupied by [Tibby]262-tibby . [Tibby]262-tibby was asleep . [He]262-tibby had had a good lunch . [Charles Wilcox]528-mrs. wilcox had not yet rung [him]262-tibby up for the distracting interview . " No , do n't bother . "[262-tibby]

" [They]5882-they have taken [the car]1528-the car to [Howards End]257-helen , "[317-leonard] said the parlourmaid to [Leonard]317-leonard .

[He]317-leonard thanked [her]278-margaret , and asked whereabouts [that place]3653-that place was .

" [You]317-leonard appear to want to know a good deal , "[278-margaret] [she]278-margaret remarked . But [Margaret]278-margaret had forbidden [her]278-margaret to be mysterious . [She]278-margaret told [him]317-leonard against [her]278-margaret better judgment that [Howards End]257-helen was in [Hertfordshire]77-hertfordshire .

" Is it [a village]5884-a village , please ? "[278-margaret]

" [Village]249-village ! [It]249-village 's [[Mr. Wilcox]261-mr. wilcox 's private house]5885-mr. wilcox 's private house - at least , [it]249-village 's [one of [them]249-village]2673-one of them . " Yes . And when will [they]249-village be back ? "[278-margaret]

" [Mr. Schlegel]276-mr. schlegel does n't know . [We]3655-their ca n't know everything , can [we]3655-their ? "[278-margaret] [She]278-margaret shut [him]3654-he out , and went to attend to the telephone , which was ringing furiously .

[He]3654-he loitered away another night of agony . Confession grew more difficult . As soon as possible [he]3654-he went to bed . [He]3654-he watched a patch of moonlight cross the floor of [[their]3655-their lodging]3656-their lodging , and , as sometimes happens when the mind is overtaxed , [he]3654-he fell asleep for the rest of [the room]1189-the room , but kept awake for the patch of moonlight . Horrible ! Then began one of those disintegrating dialogues . [Part of [him]3654-he]3658-part of him said : " Why horrible ? It 's ordinary light from [the room]1189-the room . "[3658-part of him] " But it moves . "[3658-part of him] " So does the moon . "[3658-part of him] " But it is a clenched fist . "[3658-part of him] " Why not ? "[3658-part of him] " But it is going to touch [me]3658-part of him . "[3658-part of him] " Let [it]5890-it . "[3658-part of him] And , seeming to gather motion , the patch ran up [his]3654-he blanket . Presently a blue snake appeared ; then another , parallel to it . " Is there life in the moon ? "[3658-part of him] " Of course . "[3658-part of him] " But [I]3658-part of him thought it was uninhabited . "[3658-part of him] " Not by Time , [Death]495-death , Judgment , and the smaller snakes . "[3658-part of him] " Smaller snakes ! "[317-leonard] said [Leonard]317-leonard indignantly and aloud . " What a notion ! "[317-leonard] By a rending effort of the will [he]3654-he woke the rest of [the room]1189-the room up . [Jacky]325-jacky , the bed , [their]3655-their food , [their]3655-their clothes on the chair , gradually entered [his]3654-he consciousness , and the horror vanished outwards , like a ring that is spreading through water .

" [I]3660-her say , [Jacky]325-jacky , [I]3660-her 'm going out for a bit . "[3660-her]

[She]3660-her was breathing regularly . The patch of light fell clear of the striped blanket , and began to cover the shawl that lay over [her]3660-her feet . Why had [he]3654-he been afraid ? [He]3654-he went to the window , and saw that the moon was descending through a clear sky . [He]3654-he saw [her]3660-her volcanoes , and the bright expanses that [a gracious error]3661-a gracious error has named [seas]3662-seas . [They]3662-seas paled , for the sun , who had lit [them]3662-seas up , was coming to light [the earth]1464-the earth . [Sea of Serenity]250-sea of serenity , [Sea of Tranquillity]251-sea of tranquillity , Ocean of [the Lunar Storms]252-the lunar storms , merged into one lucent drop , itself to slip into the sempiternal dawn . And [he]3654-he had been afraid of the moon !

[He]3654-he dressed among the contending lights , and went through [his]3654-he money . It was running low again , but enough for a return ticket to [Hilton]33-hilton . As it clinked [Jacky]325-jacky opened [her]3660-her eyes .

" Hullo , [Len]317-leonard ! What ho , [Len]317-leonard ! "[3660-her]

" What ho , [Jacky]325-jacky ! see [you]325-jacky again later . "[325-jacky]

[She]3660-her turned over and slept .

[The house]578-the house was unlocked , [[their]3665-their landlord]3666-their landlord being [a salesman at [Convent Garden]253-convent garden]3667-a salesman at convent garden . [Leonard]317-leonard passed out and made [his]317-leonard way down to [the station]671-the station . [The train]3884-the train , though it did not start for an hour , was already drawn up at the end of [the platform]3670-the platform , and [he]317-leonard lay down in [it]3884-the train and slept . With the first jolt [he]317-leonard was in daylight ; [they]3665-their had left [the gateways of [King 's Cross]15-king 's cross]3671-the gateways of king 's cross , and were under blue sky . [Tunnels]557-tunnels followed , and after each the sky grew bluer , and from [the embankment at [Finsbury Park]3673-finsbury park]3672-the embankment at finsbury park [he]317-leonard had [his]317-leonard first sight of the sun . [It]3674-it rolled along behind the eastern smokes - a wheel , whose fellow was the descending moon - and as yet it seemed the servant of the blue sky , not [its lord]3675-its lord . [He]317-leonard dozed again . Over [Tewin Water]32-tewin water it was day . To the left fell the shadow of the embankment and [its]3672-the embankment at finsbury park arches ; to the right [Leonard]317-leonard saw up into [the Tewin Woods]3676-the tewin woods and towards [the church]1414-the church , with [its]1414-the church wild legend of immortality . Six forest trees - that is a fact - grow out of one of [the graves in [Tewin churchyard]254-tewin churchyard]3678-the graves in tewin churchyard . [[The grave]3679-the grave 's occupant]3680-the grave 's occupant - that is the legend - is [an atheist]3681-an atheist , who declared that if [God]290-god existed , six forest trees would grow out of [her]3681-an atheist grave . These things in [Hertfordshire]77-hertfordshire ; and farther afield lay [the house of [a hermit]622-a hermit]3682-the house of a hermit - [Mrs. Wilcox]528-mrs. wilcox had known [him]317-leonard - who barred [himself]317-leonard up , and wrote prophecies , and gave all [he]317-leonard had to [the poor]996-the poor . While , powdered in between , were the villas of [business men , who saw life more steadily , though with the steadiness of the half - closed eye]3685-business men , who saw life more steadily , though with the steadiness of the half - closed eye . Over all the sun was streaming , to all the birds were singing , to all the primroses were yellow , and the speedwell blue , and [the country]4234-the country , however [they]3687-they interpreted [her]3681-an atheist , was uttering [her]3681-an atheist cry of " now . "[3681-an atheist] [She]3681-an atheist did not free [Leonard]317-leonard yet , and the knife plunged deeper into [his]317-leonard heart as [the train]3884-the train drew up at [Hilton]33-hilton . But remorse had become beautiful .

[Hilton]33-hilton was asleep , or at the earliest , breakfasting . [Leonard]317-leonard noticed the contrast when [he]317-leonard stepped out of it into [the country]4234-the country . Here [men]616-men had been up since dawn . [Their]616-men hours were ruled , not by [a [London]2-london office]3691-a london office , but by the movements of the crops and the sun . That [they]616-men were men of the finest type only [the sentimentalist]3692-the sentimentalist can declare . But [they]616-men kept to the life of daylight . [They]616-men are [England]35-england 's hope . Clumsily [they]616-men carry forward the torch of the sun , until such time as [the nation]3693-the nation sees fit to take it up . [Half clodhopper]3694-half clodhopper , [half board - school prig]3695-half board - school prig , [they]616-men can still throw back to a nobler stock , and breed yeomen .

At the chalk pit a motor passed [him]317-leonard . In it was another type , whom [Nature]381-nature favours - [the Imperial]511-imperial . Healthy , ever in motion , it hopes to inherit [the earth]1464-the earth . [It]511-imperial breeds as quickly as [the yeoman]3697-the yeoman , and as soundly ; strong is the temptation to acclaim [it]511-imperial as [a super - yeoman , who carries [[his]317-leonard country]3699-his country 's virtue overseas]3698-a super - yeoman , who carries his country 's virtue overseas . But [the Imperialist]3700-the imperialist is not what [he]3700-the imperialist thinks or seems . [He]3700-the imperialist is [a destroyer]3701-a destroyer . [He]3700-the imperialist prepares the way for cosmopolitanism , and though [his]3700-the imperialist ambitions may be fulfilled , [the earth]1464-the earth that [he]3700-the imperialist inherits will be grey .

To [Leonard]317-leonard , intent on [his]317-leonard private sin , there came the conviction of innate goodness elsewhere . It was not the optimism which [he]317-leonard had been taught at [school]3703-school . Again and again must the drums tap , and the goblins stalk over [the universe]960-the universe before joy can be purged of the superficial . It was rather paradoxical , and arose from [his]317-leonard sorrow . Death destroys [a man]658-a man , but the idea of death saves [him]658-a man - that is the best account of it that has yet been given . [Squalor]558-squalor and tragedy can beckon to all that is great in [us]3706-us , and strengthen the wings of love . [They]3707-they can beckon ; it is not certain that [they]3707-they will , for [they]3707-they are not [love 's servants]3708-love 's servants . But [they]3707-they can beckon , and the knowledge of this incredible truth comforted [him]317-leonard .

As [he]317-leonard approached [the house]578-the house all thought stopped . Contradictory notions stood side by side in [his]317-leonard mind . [He]317-leonard was terrified but happy , ashamed , but had done no sin . Chapter 43

Out of the turmoil and horror that had begun with [Aunt Juley]267-aunt juley 's illness and was not even to end with [Leonard]317-leonard 's death , it seemed impossible to [Margaret]278-margaret that healthy life should re - emerge . Events succeeded in a logical , yet senseless , train . [People]3893-people lost [their]3893-people humanity , and took values as arbitrary as those in a pack of playing - cards . It was natural that [Henry]360-henry should do this and cause [Helen]479-helen to do that , and then think [her]479-helen wrong for doing it ; natural that [she]479-helen [herself]479-helen should think [him]360-henry wrong ; natural that [Leonard]317-leonard should want to know how [Helen]479-helen was , and come , and [Charles]261-mr. wilcox be angry with [him]360-henry for coming - natural , but unreal . In this jangle of causes and effects what had become of [their]3761-their true selves ? Here [Leonard]317-leonard lay dead in [the garden]581-the garden , from natural causes ; yet life was [a deep , deep river]3763-a deep , deep river , death a blue sky , life was [a house]3920-a house , death a wisp of hay , a flower , [a tower]3765-a tower , life and death were anything and everything , except this ordered insanity , where [the king]3766-the king takes [the queen]1131-the queen , and [the ace]3768-the ace [the king]3766-the king . Ah , no ; there was beauty and adventure behind , such as [the man at [her]479-helen feet had yearned for]3770-the man at her feet had yearned for ; there was hope this side of the grave ; there were truer relationships beyond the limits that fetter [us]3771-us now . As [a prisoner]3772-a prisoner looks up and sees stars beckoning , so [she]3772-a prisoner , from the turmoil and horror of those days , caught glimpses of the diviner wheels .

And [Helen]479-helen , dumb with fright , but trying to keep calm for [the child]2281-the child 's sake , and [Miss Avery]469-miss avery , calm , but murmuring tenderly , " [No one]700-no one ever told [the lad]5940-the lad [he]5940-the lad 'll have [a child]5685-a child "[469-miss avery] - [they]3774-they also reminded [her]3772-a prisoner that horror is not the end . To what ultimate harmony [we]3771-us tend [she]3772-a prisoner did not know , but there seemed great chance that [a child]5685-a child would be born into [the world]836-the world , to take the great chances of beauty and adventure that [the world]836-the world offers . [She]3772-a prisoner moved through [the sunlit garden]3778-the sunlit garden , gathering narcissi , crimson - eyed and white . There was nothing else to be done ; the time for telegrams and anger was over , and it seemed wisest that the hands of [Leonard]317-leonard should be folded on [his]317-leonard breast and be filled with flowers . Here was [the father]3877-the father ; leave it at that . Let [Squalor]558-squalor be turned into [Tragedy , whose eyes are the stars , and whose hands hold the sunset and the dawn]3780-tragedy , whose eyes are the stars , and whose hands hold the sunset and the dawn .

And even the influx of [officials]3781-officials , even the return of [the doctor , vulgar and acute]3782-the doctor , vulgar and acute , could not shake [her]3772-a prisoner belief in the eternity of beauty . Science explained [people]3893-people , but could not understand [them]3893-people . After long centuries among the bones and muscles it might be advancing to knowledge of the nerves , but this would never give understanding . [One]602-one could open the heart to [Mr. Mansbridge]541-mr. mansbridge and [[his]541-mr. mansbridge sort]3785-his sort without discovering its secrets to [them]3786-they , for [they]3786-they wanted everything down in black and white , and black and white was exactly what [they]3786-they were left with .

[They]3786-they questioned [her]3772-a prisoner closely about [Charles]261-mr. wilcox . [She]3772-a prisoner never suspected why . Death had come , and [the doctor]666-the doctor agreed that it was due to heart disease . [They]3786-they asked to see [[her]3772-a prisoner father]915-her father 's sword . " No doubt [Mr. Wilcox]261-mr. wilcox may have induced death , "[3772-a prisoner] [she]3772-a prisoner said ; " but if it was n't one thing it would have been another , as [you]5942-you yourselves know . "[3772-a prisoner] At last [they]3786-they thanked [her]3772-a prisoner , and took the sword and the body down to [Hilton]33-hilton . [She]3772-a prisoner began to pick up the books from the floor .

[Helen]479-helen had gone to [the farm]605-the farm . It was the best place for [her]479-helen , since [she]479-helen had to wait for the inquest . Though , as if things were not hard enough , [Madge]278-margaret and [[her]278-margaret husband]1223-her husband had raised trouble ; [they]3786-they did not see why [they]3786-they should receive the offscourings of [Howards End]257-helen . And , of course , [they]3786-they were right . [The whole world]4155-the whole world was going to be right , and amply avenge any brave talk against the conventions . " Nothing matters , "[270-the schlegels] [the Schlegels]270-the schlegels had said in the past , " except [one]602-one 's self - respect and that of [[one]602-one 's friends]5945-one 's friends . "[270-the schlegels] When the time came , other things mattered terribly . However , [Madge]278-margaret had yielded , and [Helen]479-helen was assured of peace for one day and night , and tomorrow [she]479-helen would return to [Germany]3-germany .

As for [herself]479-helen , [she]479-helen determined to go too . No message came from [Henry]360-henry ; perhaps [he]360-henry expected [her]479-helen to apologize . Now that [she]479-helen had time to think over [her]479-helen own tragedy , [she]479-helen was unrepentant . [She]479-helen neither forgave [him]360-henry for [his]360-henry behaviour nor wished to forgive [him]360-henry . [Her]479-helen speech to [him]360-henry seemed perfect . [She]479-helen would not have altered a word . It had to be uttered once in a life , to adjust the lopsidedness of [the world]836-the world . It was spoken not only to [[her]479-helen husband]1223-her husband , but to [thousands of men like [him]360-henry]3794-thousands of men like him - a protest against the inner darkness in high places that comes with a commercial age . Though [he]360-henry would build up [his]360-henry life without [hers]479-helen , [she]479-helen could not apologize . [He]360-henry had refused to connect , on the clearest issue that can be laid before [a man]658-a man , and [their]3796-their love must take the consequences .

No , there was nothing more to be done . [They]3796-their had tried not to go over the precipice but perhaps the fall was inevitable . And it comforted [her]479-helen to think that the future was certainly inevitable : cause and effect would go jangling forward to some goal doubtless , but to none that [she]479-helen could imagine . At such moments the soul retires within , to float upon the bosom of a deeper stream , and has communion with the dead , and sees [the world]836-the world 's glory not diminished , but different in kind to what [she]479-helen has supposed . [She]479-helen alters [her]479-helen focus until trivial things are blurred . [Margaret]278-margaret had been tending this way all the winter . [Leonard]317-leonard 's death brought [her]479-helen to the goal . With unfaltering eye [she]479-helen traced [his]360-henry future . [He]360-henry would soon present a healthy mind to [the world]836-the world again , and what did [he]360-henry or [the world]836-the world care if [he]360-henry was rotten at the core ? [He]360-henry would settle down - though [she]479-helen could not realize this . In [her]479-helen eyes [Henry]360-henry was always moving and causing [others]893-others to move , until the ends of [the earth]1464-the earth met . But in time [he]360-henry must get too tired to move , and settle down . What next ? The inevitable word . The release of the soul to [its appropriate Heaven]3807-its appropriate heaven .

Would [they]3808-they meet in it ? [Margaret]278-margaret believed in immortality for [herself]278-margaret . An eternal future had always seemed natural to [her]278-margaret . And [Henry]360-henry believed in it for [himself]360-henry . Yet , would [they]3808-they meet again ? Are there not rather endless levels beyond the grave , as the theory that [he]360-henry had censured teaches ? And [his]360-henry level , whether higher or lower , could it possibly be the same as [hers]479-helen ?

" [You]278-margaret ! "[479-helen] cried [Helen]479-helen . " [You]278-margaret did it all , sweetest , though [you]278-margaret 're too stupid to see .
